name: Make Money with Ad7.biz and WP
author: ad7.biz

sections.description:
Description: Monetize your WordPress site or blog with Ad7.biz shortlinks. Automatic Shorten a URL in content post using Ad7.biz and get earn money. This plugin can convert automatic your links to Ad7.biz, no need to do it manually.

Options:

  • Enable/Disable ad7.biz plugin
  • Convert outgoing links (out links or all) links to ad7.biz or disable
  • Include or exclude domain list
  • AD Entry script: Enable/Disable

  • Ad type: Intestitial/Banner

    You will need an Ad7.biz User ID. To get it, login to Ad7.biz go to http://ad7.biz/referrals.php and find ?r=xxxx. xxxx is your Ad7.biz User ID.

Donations

No donations accepted from now on.
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins-> Add New Plugin -> Upload
  2. Upload make-money-with-ad7biz-and-wp.zip
  3. Activate the plugin.
  4. Navigate to Settings-> Ad7.biz Settings, enable plugin and put your Ad7.biz id. To get it, login to Ad7.biz go to http://ad7.biz/referrals.php and find ?r=xxxx. xxxx is your Ad7.biz ID.
